SEARCH
Package com.syncura360.controller

Class SettingController

java.lang.Object
com.syncura360.controller.SettingController
@RestController @CrossOrigin(origins="*") @RequestMapping("/setting") public class SettingController extends Object
Controller class for managing settings related to hospital and staff accounts. Provides endpoints for modifying staff passwords and retrieving hospital/staff settings.
Author:
Darsh-KP

  • Method Details

    • modifyPassword

      @PutMapping("/password") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<GenericMessageResponseDTO> modifyPassword(@RequestHeader(name="Authorization") String authorization, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid StaffPasswordChangeForm staffPasswordChangeForm, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
      Endpoint to modify a staff member's password.
      Parameters:
      authorization - JWT token in the request header.
      staffPasswordChangeForm - DTO containing current and new password.
      bindingResult - Result of validating the form.
      Returns:
      A response entity with a status message indicating success or failure.

    • fetchHospitalSetting

      @GetMapping("/hospital") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<HospitalSettingFetch> fetchHospitalSetting(@RequestHeader(name="Authorization") String authorization)
      Endpoint to fetch the settings of the hospital associated with the logged-in staff member.
      Parameters:
      authorization - JWT token in the request header.
      Returns:
      A response entity containing hospital settings or an appropriate error response.

    • fetchStaffSetting

      @GetMapping("/staff") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<StaffSettingFetch> fetchStaffSetting(@RequestHeader(name="Authorization") String authorization)
      Endpoint to fetch the settings of the logged-in staff member.
      Parameters:
      authorization - JWT token in the request header.
      Returns:
      A response entity containing staff settings or an appropriate error response.
